movie.title: Loft
movie.actors: Koen De Bouw, Filip Peeters, Matthias Schoenaerts, Bruno Vanden Broecke
movie.plot: 5 friends who are all married and know each other very well decide to rent a loft together. In this loft they meet their mistresses. Everything is OK until one morning the body of an unknown young woman is found in the loft. The 5 friends begin to suspect each other of murder. And it becomes clear that they don't know each other as good as they always thought.
